long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stats Tooltip dynamically inserts hover-on tooltips for MLB active player names within articles and blogs. Provides customizable statistics on active MLB players for the past three seasons, as well as aggregate projections (ATC). 

All data is live and will update as the season progresses. 

Also provides a link to Fangraphs and Baseball Reference profiles.

Works on over 75 baseball and news sites.
